objectives.text: I see you working yourself to death crafting all these stairs and planks on your own. I think it's about time to get a sawmill to automate this task!

result.text: The sawmill is able to craft most wood related blocks on demand and your couriers will make sure that they get all they need for it! But before we do that, we need to first research it at the university!'

Alrighty then! You know the drill, craft the sawmill hut block in a crafting bench, place it and let your builder build it. This time put three wooden axes in the middle, put the build tool at the top and fill up the rest with planks.
